text: samadhanavumayea (yud'dha) bhitiyumayea bandhappetta valla varttayum avarkk vannukittiyal avarat pracarippikkukayayi. avarat rasulinreyum avarile karyavivaramullavaruteyum tirumanattin vittirunnuvenkil avarute kuttattil ninn niriksicc manas'silakkan kalivullavar atinre yathart'thyam manas'silakkikkeallumayirunnu. ninnalute mel allahuvinre anugrahavum karunyavum illayirunnuvenkil ninnalil alpam cilarealike pisacine pinparrumayirunnu
